topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54696a206368724ad9540200#post_54696a206368724ad9540200
[bq="SquiggyBomb"]"@Albus Fahrenheits":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/546969bf6368725d727a0100#post_546969bf6368725d727a0100
Hmmmmmm. We've actually talked about this before. Turning Derpibooru into a Dating Sim. I'd play it.[/bq]
I know what I'd be
!http://img1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20141013044843/gravityfalls/images/d/d0/Giffany_happy.gif!

"@ParagonCommander":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/546986426368727ac3320000#post_546986426368727ac3320000
[bq="ParagonCommander"]Question: Am I boring cause I refuse to get drunk?
Any time I go out with friends, they talk about where they've been sick or that they can't remember a previous night. They talk about these things as if they're accomplishments and I'm just sitting sipping a beer with no intention of getting wasted.

There was wine for fucks sake but none of them even like wine! They only drink it to get drunk faster! I'm the only one who enjoys wine as a drink! THE ONLY GODDAMN ONE!

I just want to remember the previous night as a good thing rather than forget it because I drank too much.

To them it's something of a rite of passage to get drunk.

[spoiler]Fuck the rite of passage.[/spoiler][/bq]
I'm not 21 yet, no alcohol for me. But I do suspect that at least a quarter of my class drinks or does drugs. I wouldn't be surprised if that was true though.

I'd use them correctly probably 19% of the time, at most.

topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5469953463687249a1b30000#post_5469953463687249a1b30000
Rider Belts usually have more mix-and-match capabilities than morphers.
The OOO Driver and the Double Driver in particular. The only problem with the Double Driver is you need two people for it to function.
